intro: Can Shiki, a ghost-hunting apprentice, escape from the high-rise apartment building that has become a realm of the supernatural?
description:
■Game Overview
“Shiki-Shiki! Haunted Dungeon” is a 2D exploration action game (Metroidvania) featuring unique gameplay centered around “Shiki-Wall”—the ability to create walls and platforms at targeted locations.
The story follows Shiki, a ghost-hunting apprentice girl, as she confronts a curse placed upon the high-rise apartment complex that serves as the game's setting.

■System Introduction
Shiki's trusty weapon is her paper dolls, the “Shikigami”!
Shikigami are versatile tools for attacking, defending, moving, and activating gimmicks.
The “Shiki-Wall” ability—transforming Shikigami into walls—is especially key to progress!
However, you start with only one Shikigami.
Explore the labyrinth to find items and power up Shiki!
Beyond “Shiki-Wall,” discover many fun power-ups with unique uses!
You can also learn powerful techniques that require ‘Ki’ to use!
There are “Pebbles” too!

■Features
・Estimated 10-20 hours to first clear
・Over 20 types of power-up items
・Over 20 boss battles
・Complex dungeon with over 300 scenes
・Aim for 100% completion of “Map,” “Inventory,” and ‘Subjugation’
・Bonus features: “Hon-teddo” for advanced players and “Time Attack” to record your fastest run

The "Pixel Game Maker Series" is a series of games created using the action game creation software "Pixel Game Maker MV" that can be enjoyed on the Nintendo Switch™.
